name: The Search For The Guy That Asked
name_original: The Search For The Guy That Asked
description:
I have made this game for The Simulator 2 Game Jam on Scratch. 

BTW THIS GAME IS VERY BUGGY and once you are in a room you are trapped so...yea. There are 7 endings including the secret one (which is optional) and final one. Fun fact: I took only 2 days to make this because I joined late. Also credits to Undertale, Dream, and Earthbound. 

totally not fake reviews:

IGN: What did I just witness.

Rotten Tomatoes: Bro this is a movie rating company, not a game rating company.

IMDB: An absolute masterpiece. Ok we said the line can we go back home to our families now? You have been holding us hostage for over 20 years.
